name: Bob Cat Off-Duty
description:
Welcome to the world of Work Vehicles in this new 3D Bob Cat simulator game.Bob Cat Off Duty is a game for all our hard working friends out there who like to drive heavy duty bulldozer like Bob Cat and other construction machines like soil diggers, sandbox lifters, chesty pullers, earth drillers, caterpillars and mighty backhoes.

FEATURES:
• Easy simulator controls for your fingers and touch
• HD graphics and pleasing sounds.
• Extremely addictive game play
• Real life physics of driving
• Superb controls

Your feedback is welcomed and rate us five stars so we can provide you with top free games forever.

HAVE A NICE DAY & GET SOMETIME TO PLAY. . . . …..
